title: Weird Request. Looking to trade. Elvis Presley autograph for T206 cards!
author: Bpm0014

posts.post_title: Weird Request. Looking to trade. Elvis Presley autograph for T206 cards!
posts.post_content: Kind of a weird request. Used to collect autographs but now am trying to put The Monster together. Currently at 402. This is the autograph that got me started. Given to me by my grandparents. They met him in Vegas.  Awesome provenance/story behind it too!  GUARANTEED TO PASS EACH AND EVERY AND ALL grading companies as authentic. GUARANTEED FOR LIFE. In perfect condition. If anyone is interested I'll post pics. Don't really want to sell it; probably just trade. T206 cards only. Thanks!!
